content.question: Let <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be a function with first derivative given by <math alttext="h prime of x, equals, x times the cosine of the square root of x cubed, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.05em"></mspace><mi>x</mi><mi>cos</mi><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></msqrt></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>. At what values of <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> does <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> have local maxima on the interval <math alttext="0 less than x, less than 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.351" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.351</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="3.951" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.951</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> only

<math alttext="2.811" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.811</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="4.945" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.945</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> only

<math alttext="1.351" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.351</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="2.811" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.811</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="3.951" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.951</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="4.945" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.945</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1.351" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.351</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="3.951" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.951</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> only

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema
